keyMoments.title: Luffy vs Blueno on Courthouse Roof
keyMoments.description: Luffy reaches the courthouse rooftop and engages CP9 agent Blueno in combat.
keyMoments.significance: First one-on-one battle with a CP9 member, testing Luffy's growth.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Motivation Revealed
keyMoments.description: Luffy explains that after being defeated by Admiral Aokiji, he realized he needed to become stronger to protect his friends.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's character growth and strategic thinking in response to past defeats.
keyMoments.quote: When Aokiji defeated me...I thought if I'm to encounter more strong guys like him in the future I won't be able to protect my friends unless I become stronger.

keyMoments.title: Gear 2 Revealed
keyMoments.description: Luffy unveils his new technique, Gear 2, pumping his blood at incredible speeds and covering his body in steam.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most iconic moments in One Piece. Represents Luffy's first major transformation and a massive power-up.
keyMoments.quote: I needed a way to be stronger in order to protect my friends. I developed a new technique to take my abilities one step higher. I call it... Gear 2!

abilities.description: Luffy pumps his blood at incredible speeds, increasing oxygen and nutrients to his body. This dramatically enhances his speed and power, causing steam to emanate from his body and his skin to take on a reddish hue.

reveals.information: Developed Gear 2 technique after defeat by Aokiji
Luffy now thinks strategically about future threats and prepares accordingly

keyMoments.title: Battles Luffy on Courthouse Roof
keyMoments.description: Blueno faces Luffy on the courthouse rooftop, demonstrating his Rokushiki mastery with Soru, Shigan, and Rankyaku.
keyMoments.significance: Serves as the catalyst for Luffy to reveal his new power.

keyMoments.title: Uses Tekkai 'Sai' Variation
keyMoments.description: Blueno demonstrates a variation of the Tekkai technique called Tekkai 'Sai'.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the depth of CP9's Rokushiki techniques.

abilities.description: A variation of the Tekkai technique, an advanced Rokushiki ability.

keyMoments.title: Blinded But Continues Forward
keyMoments.description: Gomorrah is struck by the Just Eleven Jurymen's iron balls, damaging his retinas and blinding him. Despite this, he continues charging toward the courthouse.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates unwavering loyalty and determination to help rescue Franky.

reveals.information: Gomorrah's eyes are damaged, blinding him

keyMoments.title: Uses Upgraded Perfect Clima Tact
keyMoments.description: Nami demonstrates her upgraded Perfect Clima Tact, creating a powerful thundercloud that defeats Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's combat growth and the effectiveness of Usopp's upgrades.

keyMoments.title: Demolishes Buildings with Sanji
keyMoments.description: Zoro cuts through stone structures with ease, working with Sanji to destroy buildings blocking their path.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Monster Trio's power growth and ability to cooperate.

keyMoments.title: Slices Through Courthouse Gate
keyMoments.description: Zoro cuts through the gate to the Courthouse Plaza, granting the crew access.
keyMoments.significance: Marks successful completion of crossing the Main Island.

keyMoments.title: Demolishes Buildings with Zoro
keyMoments.description: Sanji executes high-speed kicks, working with Zoro to destroy buildings blocking their path.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Monster Trio's power growth and ability to cooperate.

keyMoments.title: Receives Devastating Casualty Report
keyMoments.description: Spandam learns that 60 intruders have caused over 2,000 casualties, with Luffy responsible for more than half.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the unprecedented scale of the attack on Enies Lobby.

keyMoments.title: Defects from World Government
keyMoments.description: Oimo officially defects after learning Dorry and Brogy were never captured by the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals World Government deception and provides crucial support to the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: Switches from World Government to Straw Hat allies

keyMoments.title: Defects from World Government
keyMoments.description: Kashii officially defects after learning Dorry and Brogy were never captured by the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals World Government deception and provides crucial support to the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: Switches from World Government to Straw Hat allies

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Explains Gomorrah's Determination
keyMoments.description: Chopper explains to the crew that Gomorrah made a promise to Sodom to reach the courtyard.
keyMoments.significance: Provides context for Gomorrah's unwavering determination despite being blinded.
keyMoments.quote: Gomorrah made a promise to Sodom that he would take us to the courtyard!
